title: Contact the Tribunal
h1: Contact the tribunal about your case

landing_text.p1: Use the appropriate form to communicate with the tribunal.
landing_text.p2: These requests and applications will be reviewed by the tribunal and copied to the applicant who will have an opportunity to respond.
landing_text.p3: You may be able to request that some details do not get shared with the applicant.

landing_text_when_represented.p1: You are now being legally represented by
landing_text_when_represented.p2: You will be kept updated but will no longer be able to submit applications or contact the tribunal directly.

CHANGE_PERSONAL_DETAILS.label: I want to change my personal details
CHANGE_PERSONAL_DETAILS.body: Change the personal details you have provided.

POSTPONE_HEARING.label: Apply to postpone my hearing
POSTPONE_HEARING.body: Ask the tribunal to postpone your hearing to a later date.

VARY_OR_REVOKE_ORDER.label: Apply to vary or revoke an order
VARY_OR_REVOKE_ORDER.body: Apply to vary or revoke an order the tribunal has issued. For example, you may need more time to submit something or want to change the number of pages in your hearing documents,

CONSIDER_DECISION_AFRESH.label: Apply to have a decision considered afresh
CONSIDER_DECISION_AFRESH.body: If you disagree with a judgement or order made by a legal officer in your case you can ask an employment judge to look at that decision again.

AMEND_RESPONSE.label: Apply to amend my response
AMEND_RESPONSE.body: Request to amend your ET3 response – including removing responses or details of your response.

ORDER_OTHER_PARTY.label: Order the claimant to do something
ORDER_OTHER_PARTY.body: Apply to order the claimant to do or provide something.

ORDER_WITNESS_ATTEND.label: Order a witness to give evidence
ORDER_WITNESS_ATTEND.body: Apply to order a witness to attend to give evidence in your case.

CLAIMANT_NOT_COMPLIED.label: Tell the tribunal the claimant has not complied with an order
CLAIMANT_NOT_COMPLIED.body: Tell us that the claimant has not complied with all or part of an order from the tribunal.

RESTRICT_PUBLICITY.label: Apply to restrict publicity
RESTRICT_PUBLICITY.body: Apply to prevent or restrict publicity in your case. The tribunal may conduct hearings in private or anonymise specific parties and witnesses if necessary.

STRIKE_OUT_CLAIM.label: Strike out all or part of the claimant's claim
STRIKE_OUT_CLAIM.body: You can request that the tribunal strike out all or parts of the claimant’s claim.

RECONSIDER_JUDGMENT.label: Apply for the judgment to be reconsidered
RECONSIDER_JUDGMENT.body: Ask to have a judgement made by a judge reconsidered.

CONTACT_TRIBUNAL.label: Contact the tribunal about something else
CONTACT_TRIBUNAL.body: Tell or ask the tribunal about something relevant to your case, and which is not covered by the other options on this page.

call.h1: Call the Employment Tribunal customer contact centre
call.p1: Call if you have any questions about your response. They cannot give you legal advice or process any updates to your case.
call.p2: Use the contact forms to make a request or to provide something for the tribunal.
call.p5: The centre does not open on bank holidays.
